description: Borrowed from Japanese パチンコ (pachinko), from ぱちん (pachin, onomatopoeic sound) + こ (ko, diminutive).

entries.meaning: A mechanical ball-dropping game similar to pinball, popular in Japan.

verbs.description: pachinko (third-person singular simple present pachinkos, present participle pachinkoing, simple past and past participle pachinkoed)

entries.meaning: (intransitive) To tumble down through a series of obstacles.
